appDesc.message: E tokafatsa ChatGPT ka mekgwa ya sekerini se se bulegileng/se se tletseng/se seleele. Gape e dira mo perplexity.ai + poe.com!

menuLabel_donate.message: Ke kopa gore o romele moneelo

about_openSourceCode.message: Khoutu ya motswedi o o bulegileng

tooltip_widescreenOFF.message: Go tswa mo sekerining se se atlhameng

tooltip_fullWindowOFF.message: Go tswa mo fensetereng e e tletseng

tooltip_fullscreenOFF.message: Go tswa mo sekerining ka botlalo

helptip_adjustSettingsRelatedTo.message: Baakanya diseting tse di amanang le

helptip_widescreenWidth.message: Fetola selekanyo sa Sekirini se Segolo go se dirisa

helptip_tallerChatboxHeight.message: Fetola selekanyo sa Taller Chatbox gore e dirisiwe

helptip_tallerChatbox.message: Atolosa lebokoso la motlotlo ka go le emisa

helptip_widerChatboxWidth.message: Fetola selekanyo sa Chatbox e e atlhameng go e dirisa

helptip_widerChatbox.message: Atolosa lebokoso la motlotlo ka go le tobetsa ka mokgwa wa Sekerini se se Phara

helptip_newChatBtn.message: SHOW New Chat button in chatbox

helptip_modeNotifs.message: Bontsha dikitsiso fa o toggling modes/settings

helptip_toastMode.message: DITSHAGISO TSE DI KGOTLHISIWANG/TSE DI KGOTLHISIWANG

helptip_blockSpam.message: Go fitlha dibenara tsa spam gore di seka tsa tlhakanya tsebe

helptip_chatbarSettings.message: Laola ponagalo ya bara ya motlotlo

helptip_buttonSettings.message: Baakanya diseting tse di amanang le dikonopo

alert_isUpToDate.message: se ntse se le teng kajeno

alert_showYourSupport.message: Bontsha gore o a go ema nokeng

alert_isOSS.message: ke porokeramo ya motswedi o o bulegileng kwa ntle e e agilweng le go bolokiwa mahala go ya ka maiteko a go ithaopela go

alert_despiteAffliction.message: Go sa kgathalesege go boga mo go maswe

alert_byDonatingResults.message: ka go ntsha moneelo, o nthusa gore ke tswelele pele go tokafatsa, go baakanya disenyi, go tsenya dikarolo tse diswa, le go dira gore porokeramo e nne botoka le go feta

alert_noMatterSize.message: go sa kgathalesege gore ke saese efe

alert_directlySupports.message: ke ema maiteko a me a a sa duelelweng nokeng ka tlhamalalo go netefatsa gore porojeke eno e nne mahala ebile e bulegile go dirisiwa ke mongwe le mongwe

alert_growTogether.message: Mmogo, re ka kgona go boloka serweboleta seno se se maatla se gola

alert_pressF11.message: Tobetsa F11 go tswa mo sekirining ka botlalo

alert_f11reason.message: F11 e dirisitswe go tsenya sekirini ka botlalo, mme ka ntlha ya mabaka a pabalesego a browser, selo sa konokono se se tshwanang se tshwanetse go dirisiwa go tswa mo sekerining
